description:
Rammot (ラモット) is an officer under Colt`s command, a humanoid Chimera Ant with the genetic traits of a rabbit and a shrike. Prone to acting on his own, Rammot attacks Gon and Killua to defend his food, and is losing before being saved by Colt while vowing brutal revenge on the two youths. Being hit by the boys` attacks activates Rammot`s aura, making him the first Chimera Ant able to utilize Nen.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Rammot
